'use client'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, Title, Text, Stack, Group, Button, Badge, Progress, Table, Tabs, Alert, Timeline } from '@mantine/core'; import { IconCreditCard, IconReceipt, IconTrendingUp, IconAlertCircle, IconCheck, IconX, IconClock, IconDownload } from '@tabler/icons-react'; export default function SubscriptionManagementPage() { const [currentPlan] = useState({ name: 'PROFESSIONAL', price: 299, billingCycle: 'monthly', startDate: '2024-01-01', endDate: '2025-01-01', status: 'ACTIVE', autoRenew: true, }); const [usage] = useState({ users: { current: 78, limit: 100 }, patients: { current: 4250, limit: 10000 }, storage: { current: 45, limit: 100 }, // GB appointments: { current: 1250, limit: 5000 }, }); const [invoices] = useState([ { id: 'INV-2024-003', date: '2024-03-01', amount: 299, status: 'PAID', description: 'Professional Plan - March 2024' }, { id: 'INV-2024-002', date: '2024-02-01', amount: 299, status: 'PAID', description: 'Professional Plan - February 2024' }, { id: 'INV-2024-001', date: '2024-01-01', amount: 299, status: 'PAID', description: 'Professional Plan - January 2024' }, ]); const plans = [ { name: 'FREE', price: 0, features: [ '30 days trial', 'Up to 5 users', '100 patients', 'Basic features', 'Email support' ], limits: { users: 5, patients: 100, storage: 5, } }, { name: 'BASIC', price: 99, popular: false, features: [ 'Up to 20 users', '1,000 patients', 'Core HMS features', 'Email & Chat support', '10 GB storage' ], limits: { users: 20, patients: 1000, storage: 10, } }, { name: 'PROFESSIONAL', price: 299, popular: true, features: [ 'Up to 100 users', '10,000 patients', 'All advanced features', 'Priority support', '100 GB storage', 'Custom branding', 'API access' ], limits: { users: 100, patients: 10000, storage: 100, } }, { name: 'ENTERPRISE', price: null, popular: false, features: [ 'Unlimited users', 'Unlimited patients', 'All features', '24/7 Dedicated support', 'Unlimited storage', 'Custom integrations', 'SLA guarantee', 'On-premise option' ], limits: { users: Infinity, patients: Infinity, storage: Infinity, } }, ]; const daysUntilRenewal = Math.ceil( (new Date(currentPlan.endDate).getTime() - new Date().getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) ); return ( {/* Header */}
Subscription & Billing Manage your subscription plan and billing information
{/* Current Plan Overview */}
{currentPlan.name} Plan {currentPlan.status} ${currentPlan.price}/{currentPlan.billingCycle} ‚Ä¢ Renews on{' '} {new Date(currentPlan.endDate).toLocaleDateString()}
{daysUntilRenewal < 30 && ( } title="Renewal Notice" color="blue" mb="xl" > Your subscription will auto-renew in {daysUntilRenewal} days )} {/* Usage Stats */} Usage & Limits
Users {usage.users.current} / {usage.users.limit} 0.8 ? 'orange' : 'blue'} />
Patients {usage.patients.current.toLocaleString()} / {usage.patients.limit.toLocaleString()} 0.8 ? 'orange' : 'green'} />
Storage {usage.storage.current} GB / {usage.storage.limit} GB 0.8 ? 'orange' : 'violet'} />
Appointments (This Month) {usage.appointments.current.toLocaleString()} / {usage.appointments.limit.toLocaleString()}
{/* Tabs */} }> Available Plans }> Billing History }> Payment Method {/* Available Plans */}
{plans.map((plan) => ( {plan.popular && ( POPULAR )}
{plan.name} {plan.price === null ? 'Custom' : `$${plan.price}`} {plan.price !== null && ( /month )}
{plan.features.map((feature, idx) => ( {feature} ))} {plan.name === currentPlan.name ? ( ) : ( )} ))}
{/* Billing History */} Invoice History Invoice Date Description Amount Status Action {invoices.map((invoice) => ( {invoice.id} {new Date(invoice.date).toLocaleDateString()} {invoice.description} ${invoice.amount} {invoice.status} ))}

source:
'use client'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal, Stack, Group, Text, Paper, Title, Divider, Tabs, Avatar, Badge, Grid, Card, ActionIcon, Tooltip, Button, Timeline, Alert, Table, Spoiler, ScrollArea, Progress, ThemeIcon, List, Anchor } from '@mantine/core'; import { IconUser, IconPhone, IconMail, IconMapPin, IconCalendar, IconHeart, IconShieldX, IconFileText, IconStethoscope, IconPill, IconAlertCircle, IconHistory, IconEdit, IconDownload, IconPrinter, IconShare, IconEye, IconCloudUpload, IconClock, IconActivity, IconTrendingUp, IconMedicalCross, IconTestTube, IconX } from '@tabler/icons-react'; import { Patient, PatientVisit, PatientDocument, MedicalHistory, PatientAppointment } from '../../types/patient'; import { formatDate, formatPhoneNumber } from '../../lib/utils'; interface PatientDetailsProps { opened: boolean; onClose: () => void; patient: Patient | null; visits?: PatientVisit[]; documents?: PatientDocument[]; medicalHistory?: MedicalHistory[]; appointments?: PatientAppointment[]; onEdit?: (patient: Patient) => void; onScheduleAppointment?: (patientId: string) => void; } function PatientDetails({ opened, onClose, patient, visits = [], documents = [], medicalHistory = [], appointments = [], onEdit, onScheduleAppointment }: PatientDetailsProps) { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); if (!patient) return null; const calculateAge = (birthDate: Date): number => { const today = new Date(); const birth = new Date(birthDate); let age = today.getFullYear() - birth.getFullYear(); const monthDiff = today.getMonth() - birth.getMonth(); if (monthDiff < 0 || (monthDiff === 0 && today.getDate() < birth.getDate())) { age--; } return age; }; // Overview Tab const OverviewTab = () => ( {/* Patient Summary */}
{patient.firstName} {patient.lastName} {patient.patientId} {patient.status} {patient.insuranceInfo?.isActive && ( }> Insured )} {calculateAge(patient.dateOfBirth)} years old {patient.gender} {patient.bloodGroup && ( {patient.bloodGroup} )}
{/* Quick Stats */} {patient.totalVisits} Total Visits {patient.allergies.length} Allergies {patient.chronicDiseases.length} Chronic Conditions {patient.currentMedications.length} Current Medications {/* Contact & Address */} Contact Information {formatPhoneNumber(patient.contactInfo.phone)} {patient.contactInfo.email && ( {patient.contactInfo.email} )} {patient.contactInfo.alternatePhone && ( Alt: {formatPhoneNumber(patient.contactInfo.alternatePhone)} )} Address {patient.address.street}
{patient.address.city}, {patient.address.state}
{patient.address.postalCode}, {patient.address.country} {patient.address.landmark && ( <>
Near: {patient.address.landmark} )} {/* Medical Alerts */} {(patient.allergies.length > 0 || patient.chronicDiseases.length > 0) && ( Medical Alerts {patient.allergies.length > 0 && ( }> Allergies: {patient.allergies.map((allergy, index) => ( {allergy} ))} )} {patient.chronicDiseases.length > 0 && ( }> Chronic Conditions: {patient.chronicDiseases.map((condition, index) => ( {condition} ))} )} )} ); // Visits Tab const VisitsTab = () => ( Visit History {visits.length} visits {visits.length === 0 ? ( No visits recorded yet ) : ( {visits.map((visit, index) => ( } title={ {visit.chiefComplaint} {visit.status} } > {formatDate(visit.visitDate)} {visit.doctorName} {visit.departmentName} {visit.diagnosis.length > 0 && (
Diagnosis: {visit.diagnosis.map((diag, idx) => ( {diag} ))}
)} {visit.vitals && (
Vitals: BP: {visit.vitals.bloodPressureSystolic}/{visit.vitals.bloodPressureDiastolic} mmHg HR: {visit.vitals.heartRate} bpm Temp: {visit.vitals.temperature}√Ç¬∞F SpO2: {visit.vitals.oxygenSaturation}%
)} {visit.prescriptions.length > 0 && (
Prescriptions: {visit.prescriptions.map((rx, idx) => ( {rx.medicationName} - {rx.dosage} ({rx.frequency}) ))}
)} {visit.notes && (
Notes: {visit.notes}
)} ))} )} ); // Documents Tab const DocumentsTab = () => ( Documents {documents.length === 0 ? ( No documents uploaded yet ) : ( {documents.map((doc) => (
{doc.title} {doc.documentType.replace('_', ' ')}
{doc.accessLevel} {doc.description && ( {doc.description} )} {formatDate(doc.uploadedAt)} √¢‚Ç¨¬¢ {(doc.fileSize / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB ))} )} ); // Medical History Tab const MedicalHistoryTab = () => ( Medical History {medicalHistory.length === 0 ? ( No medical history recorded yet ) : ( {medicalHistory.map((history) => ( {history.historyType} {history.title} {history.severity && ( {history.severity} )} {history.description} {history.date && ( {formatDate(history.date)} )} {history.doctorName && ( Dr. {history.doctorName} )} ))} )} ); // Appointments Tab const AppointmentsTab = () => ( Appointments {appointments.length === 0 ? ( No appointments scheduled ) : ( {appointments.map((appointment) => ( {appointment.status} {appointment.appointmentType.replace('_', ' ')} {formatDate(appointment.appointmentDate)} at {appointment.appointmentTime} {appointment.chiefComplaint && ( {appointment.chiefComplaint} )} Duration: {appointment.duration} min {appointment.reminderSent && ( √¢≈ì‚Äú Reminder sent )} ))} )} ); return ( Patient Details } size="xl" scrollAreaComponent={ScrollArea.Autosize} > setActiveTab(value || 'overview')}> }> Overview }> Visits ({visits.length}) }> Documents ({documents.length}) }> History ({medicalHistory.length}) }> Appointments ({appointments.length}) ); } export default PatientDetails;
